name: zaneops
description: zane-ops is a self-hosted operations dashboard for monitoring services and deployments. It aggregates status, logs, and metrics into a unified web interface for small teams or homelabs.
features: Service monitoring: Track the health and status of deployed services with real-time availability checks.
Deployment tracking: View deployment history, rollback options, and current versions across all services.
Log aggregation: Collect and search logs from multiple services in a centralized interface with filtering.
Metrics dashboard: Visualize resource usage, request rates, and performance metrics for all monitored services.
Alert configuration: Set up notifications for service failures, performance degradation, or deployment issues.
Container management: Monitor Docker containers and orchestration platforms with detailed resource metrics.
Environment overview: Get a unified view of development, staging, and production environments in one dashboard.
Incident tracking: Document and track incidents with timelines, affected services, and resolution steps.
Team collaboration: Share access with team members and assign responsibilities for service ownership.
API integration: Connect with CI/CD pipelines and deployment tools to automatically update service status.
Custom checks: Define health checks and monitoring rules specific to your application requirements.
Historical data: Review past performance and incidents to identify patterns and improve reliability.
